abilities.name: Lightning Orb
about: Creates a lightning orb that moves to a player location and lasts until being pull backed

abilities.name: Lightning Whip
about: Strikes enemies in front of encounter with a surge of lightning

abilities.name: Lightning Orbs Pullback
about: Pulls existing orbs back to the encounter

abilities.name: Shock Nova
about: Deals lightning damage in an area around the encounter, conjuring an initial ring followed by a larger circular area.

abilities.name: Breach Pillar
about: Spawns a breach pillar that once passed through spawns monsters
